ive never seen characters looking this adorable be this infuriating..
this is part 3
hahaha, she must have been tricked, as i thought, what a stupid lolololol, then shes gonna get blackmailed soon....

So in short in this chapter the wife starts to think everything happening is the husbands fault so to a degree her cheating is justified as punishment because of what the husband did, then finds out that tadah, her husband isn't an idiot and hadn't done anything wrong. Instead it was the boss who fucked up and the husband even made changes to help the company and started a process against the bosses corruption but the boss just told the wife he messed up and she didn't even try to check up on the stuff he made up and instead just offered herself up to him, so he's mostly doing this as revenge towards the husband and the wife is just being stupid for not trusting him. So then she breaks down cause just as he said she never trusted him and just assumed he was bad at the job. She then feels real guilty get's gangbanged but then she can't understand if she's happy or sad with the cheating.

Then the last few pages are just boss corruption was exposed, seemingly because of the husband, so he got fired and now their back to their happy life and she can now only do everything in her power and spend the rest of her life to make up to her husband and be by his side. Then last page has random coworker appear and show a picture of her and the boss while they were cheating and then she thinks something like, why? how could this happen? what should I do now?
Hate gang bangs wish it was just with the boss
Trash and thats it
yes. god bless you rocket moneky
